## AI-Powered Laptops Take Center Stage

Intel, AMD, and Qualcomm all showcased next-gen chips with dedicated NPUs. Microsoft's Copilot+ PC requirements are driving this shift, with Windows AI features becoming standard.

---

## Smart Home Gets Smarter

New smart home hubs feature local AI processing for better privacy and faster response times. Matter 2.0 compatibility is now standard across major brands.

---

## AI Photography Revolution

Computational photography reaches new heights with real-time video enhancement, automated editing, and AI-powered 3D capture becoming consumer-accessible.
